Title: The King Came Calling
Writer: Declan Croghan, Richard Warlow (creator), Richard Warlow
Actors: Matthew Macfadyen, Jerome Flynn, Adam Rothenberg, Jonathan Barnwell
Plot: A man dies in the street, and word quickly spreads that cholera may have been to blame. However, Jackson thinks otherwise, and when dozens of others become ill, the race is on to discover the origin of the sickness.
